title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 123/96 of 25 January 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 2307/95 fixing, for unginned cotton, the estimated production and amount of the advance on the aid for the 1995/96 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 123/96 of 25 January 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 2307/95 fixing, for unginned cotton, the estimated production and amount of the advance on the aid for the 1995/96 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the second indent of Article 1 (2) of Regulation (EC) No 2307/95 the amount of 'ECU 29,210` is hereby replaced by 'ECU 42,52`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 30 September 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 January 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 30. 6. 1995, p. 45.
(2) OJ No L 148, 30. 6. 1995, p. 48.
(3) OJ No L 233, 30. 9. 1995, p. 51.
